Name: Tesseract
Output Formats: Text, hOCR, others with different user interfaces or the API
Notes: Created by Hewlett-Packard; under further development by Google It was one of the top 3 engines in the 1995 UNLV Accuracy test.

Name: Screenworm
Notes: Product of Funchip. Uses the Tesseract ocr-engine.

Name: ExperVision TypeReader & RTK
Notes: Has a Mobile and Embedded System version for iOS/Android/etc.

Name: ABBYY FineReader
Output Formats: DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, PPTX, RTF, PDF, HTML, CSV, TXT, ODT, DjVu, EPUB, FB2
Notes: ABBYY also supplies SDKs for embedded and mobile devices. Professional, Corporate and Site License Editions for Windows, Express Edition for Mac.

Name: Asprise OCR SDK
Notes: Java, C#, VB.NET, C/C++/Delphi SDKs for OCR and Barcode recognition on Windows, Linux, Mac OS X and Unix.

Name: Nicomsoft OCR SDK
Notes: C#, VB.NET, C++, Delphi, Java OCR tool for Windows and Linux.

Name: AnyDoc Software
Notes: Works with structured, semi-structured, and unstructured documents.

Name: LEADTOOLS
Output Formats: PDF, PDF/A, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XPS, RTF, HTML, ANSI Text, Unicode Text, CSV
Notes: Supports Latin, Asian, Arabic, and MICR character sets. For full page, zonal, and form image processing. Includes OCR, barcode, OMR and forms recognition. ICR (handwritten text recognition) is supported.

Name: CuneiForm
Output Formats: HTML, hOCR, native, RTF, TeX, TXT
Notes: Enterprise-class system, can save text formatting and recognizes complicated tables of any structure

Name: Dynamsoft OCR SDK
Notes: Dynamsoft is the leading provider of image capture SDKs and version control tools.

Name: OmniPage
Output Formats: DOC/DOCX XLS/XLSX PPTX RTF PDF PDF/A Searchable PDF HTML Text XML ePUB MP3
Notes: Product of Nuance Communications

Name: Ocrad
Notes: Command line

Name: SmartScore
Notes: For musical scores

Name: Microsoft Office Document Imaging
Notes: Uses OmniPage

Name: Puma.NET
Notes: .NET OCR SDK based on Cognitive Technologies' CuneiForm recognition engine. Wraps Puma COM server and provides simplified API for .NET applications

Name: ReadSoft
Notes: Scan, capture and classify business documents such as invoices, forms and purchase orders integrated with business processes.

Name: Scantron
Notes: For working with localized interfaces, corresponding language support is required.

Name: OCRFeeder
Notes: Features a full user interface and has a command-line tool for automatic operations. Has its own segmentation algorithm but uses system-wide  OCR engines like Tesseract or Ocrad

Name: OCRopus
Notes: Pluggable framework under active development, used for Google Books

Name: MeOCR
Output Formats: HTML, hOCR, native, RTF, TeX, TXT
Notes: Windows application. Converts scanned documents to editable text documents using OCR and exports them to Microsoft Word with one click. Features a full user interface and also has a .NET Interface library  for developers.

Name: Name
Notes: Notes
